attributes.action: Get NHS England to say YES to a surgery in Peasmarsh
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon NHS England to agree to the provision of a satellite surgery in Peasmarsh
The Rye Medical Centre has already approved the provision of a satellite surgery in the newly refurbished Peasmarsh Memorial Hal which will be provided for the village by the Medical Centre at no additional cost to the NHS.
NHS England has refused permission for this to happen stating that 'Conditions are not satisfactory’ without any inspection of the facilities on offer which the CQC had previously approved in December 2013
Please help us reverse this decision by signing this petition as it may be the turn of your community to be treated in the same cavalier manner
